body: Whats your Avicus pet peeve! (Minor Annoyance) Mine would have to be block lag and all those people who think its funny to spleef me

title: Avicus Pet Peeve

replies.body: people covering the monuments with wood

replies.body: People who break your crafting table, players that wreck your defense, block lag, and team spleefers.

replies.body: Block lag. Period.
replies.body_tagged: Block lag. Period.

replies.body:
Because I live quite far away from the server host I get about a second of delay when firing my bow, considering that's my PVP strength it's really hindered my playing experience.

Unfortunately I can't do much about it. 

Probably explains why I'm more active on the forums than in-game.

replies.body: That moment when you're just about to kill loads of enemies but then one of your teammates gets on your way and you can't hit the enemies and they kill you...
replies.body_tagged: That moment when you're just about to kill loads of enemies but then one of your teammates gets on your way and you can't hit the enemies and they kill you...

replies.body:
1. When I'm defending a nice defence, no bridge to it, etc. Then someone comes makes  A WOOD BRIDGE, places wood on monument, and places wood until we're above the monument itself. -_- I literally, not figuratively, want to pick up my PC and throw it at them.
Noob was slain by HoboMaddy using PC
2. When I'm breaking the monument, someone walks in front of me, places blocks, then breaks it for themselves.
